alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 1:46AM MDT until August 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 58 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected over exposed ridgelines and downwind of any terrain and canyons through mid morning before strongest winds mix down to most valley areas.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
